name: Blue Duston
desc: Cannot be used as a Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Material for a Summon. While this card is face-up on the field, it cannot be Tributed. When this card on the field is destroyed: Banish 1 random card from its controller's hand, face-down, until the Standby Phase of the next turn. You can only control 1 face-up "Blue Duston".
